title: Vision Field
text:
There are N buildings stand along the horizon line. Each building are represented as a vertical segment with two end points at (i, 0) and (i, Ai). There are M queries in total. For each query, we wonder know how many buildings you can see if you stand at (0, h).... N, M ≤ 106, both Ai and h is positive integer and ≤ 109.InputNA1 A2 ... AnM(here following the M queries.)OutputFor each query, simply print how many buildings you can see.ExampleInput:5
2 3 3 3 4
3
3
2
4Output:3
2
5
